titleStmt.title: Several instances of the wrongs and oppressions by Q's and R's, suffered by the sailers of the English navy from the beginning of the late war most humbly presented to the fountain of justice, the Parliament of England.
titleStmt.author: Byrne, Gerrald.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Gerrald Byrne, a lover of the king and country.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
